topic: 3. Software deteriorates rather than wears out because
options: Software suffers from exposure to hostile environments
Defects are more likely to arise after software has been used often
Multiple change requests introduce errors in component interactions
Software spare parts become harder to order
topic_cn: 3. 软件会退化而不是磨损的原因是
options_cn: 软件会因暴露在恶劣环境中而受损
软件在被频繁使用后更容易出现缺陷
多次变更请求会在组件交互中引入错误
软件的备件变得更难订购
